title: Sheep

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot someone at night, dealing an Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must shoot every night except N1.
- The first time you kill a Town member, you lose your ability. Each night, one random visitor will capture you, forcing you to shoot their target next night.
- People do not learn that they've hired you.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
